name: zotero2readwise-plugin
description: Export your Zotero annotations and notes to Readwise - Zotero 7 Plugin

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run package
scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist && cp -r * dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf dist/node_modules dist/package*.json dist/webpack.config.js dist/dist

author: Essi Alizadeh
